hero.subtitle: Your personal project idea generator. Best of all, it's free and open source.

why_getajob.title: Why GetAJob?
why_getajob.subtitle: GetAJob is a project idea generator that helps you find the perfect project to work on. It's a great way to learn new technologies and build your portfolio. Also uses OpenAI for some extra ideas.

cards.title: Endless Ideas
cards.subtitle: Unleash your creativity with countless unique project ideas.

cards.title: Build your portfolio
cards.subtitle: GetAJob will help you build your portfolio by giving you project ideas that you can add to your portfolio.

cards.title: Tailored Suggestions
cards.subtitle: Get project suggestions tailored to your skills and interests.

steps.title: Input Preferences
steps.subtitle: Tell us about the type of project you're looking to build and your preferred sectors.

steps.title: Generate Ideas
steps.subtitle: Let OpenAI generate unique and innovative project ideas based on your preferences.

steps.title: Fine Tune
steps.subtitle: Refine your project idea with features, homepage sections, and additional pages.

steps.title: Get Coding!
steps.subtitle: Receive your tailored project plan, complete with suggested code snippets, and get started on building.
